title: RepoForge: Training a SOTA Fast-thinking SWE Agent with an End-to-End Data Curation Pipeline Synergizing SFT and RL at Scale
abstract: The Problem: Training software engineering (SWE) LLMs is bottlenecked by expensive infrastructure, inefficient evaluation pipelines, scarce training data, and costly quality control. Our Solution: RepoForge: an autonomous, end-to-end pipeline that generates, evaluates, and trains SWE agents at scale. We present:...
